title: 94/765/EC: Commission Decision of 18 November 1994 approving 26 proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between Member States (Edicom)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 November 1994 approving 26 proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between  Member States (Edicom) (94/765/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The 26 proposals listed in Annex may receive Community financing up to the maximum amounts stated in that annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 November 1994.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 183, 19. 7. 1994, p. 42.
(2) OJ No L 181, 23. 6. 1989, p. 47.
(3) OJ No L 316, 16. 11. 1991, p. 1.
